developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

app_name: 拼多多 - 多多买菜，百亿补贴
developer: Shanghai Xunmeng Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
拼多多——多实惠，多乐趣

拼多多，社交新电商，更懂消费者的手机购物APP。8亿用户在此拼团，享受更高性价比的生活。和你的家人、朋友、邻居一起拼，品质商品更低价，包邮送到家，分享实惠，分享乐趣。

-多多买菜
1、依托拼多多全新的农产品上行物流体系，一键直达全国超过1000个农产品产区。
2、从田间到餐桌，避免中间环节损耗，百亿补贴加专项补贴，买菜更划算。
3、手机变成菜篮子，精选全国及海外农产区产地优质好货，覆盖各类生活必需品。
4、足不出户为家庭轻松选购次日生鲜，拿起手机选购，带着蔬果回家。

-更懂生活，好货不必贵
1、品类丰富：覆盖全品类品牌商品。小百货9.9包邮，轻松提升日常幸福感，品牌商品更低价，助你完成美好生活梦想。
2、百亿补贴：精选补贴全网热销品牌商品，直接降价，购物不必做算术题。
3、产地好货：源头好货产地直达，从农田到餐桌，从车间到小区，中国制造四十年产业经验为你敞开。
4、正品保障：假一赔十，品牌商品正品险，海关全程监督。

-分享乐趣，购物不孤单
1、发现好物，与好友共同分享，体验发现低价好货的乐趣。
2、和志同道合的好友拼单，或参与万人团，与8亿拼多多用户一起拼。拼团享受更低价，组团购物不孤单。
3、和朋友玩转小游戏。好朋友，就要一起栽种，一起收获。
4、为好友呈现你的真实点评，为真朋友说出真体验。

-产地直播，商家陪你看海
1、看数百万真实商家产地直播。看红薯从地里挖出，看菠萝的海，看一双鞋如何从生产线走到你面前。
2、市县长代言各产业带好货。市长县长精选本地产业带尖货，化身拼多多主播为你在线答疑。

-多多视频，有趣内容刷不停
1、魔法视频、超多滤镜、新奇特效、一键跟拍，出大片如此简单！
2、生活妙招、搞笑视频、美食菜谱、精彩直播，想看的这里都有！
3、高清画质、全屏沉浸、海量视频、智能推荐，多实惠更多乐趣！

因为倾听，所以更懂你

官方微信：拼多多（pinduoduo2015）
官方微博：@拼多多
客服电话：400-8822-528
消费者固话热线：021-53395288
官网：http://www.pinduoduo.com

A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for:

-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Vintage app is a virtual flea market, where you can buy and sell beautiful vintage style clothes, furniture, secondhand stuff or new products. Discover awesome bargains in your neighborhood or list your preowned items for sale in seconds!

Vintage is completely FREE - no listing, buying or transaction fees! 

WHY VINTAGE APP?
•	Simple and Easy to use
•	Buy and Sell in seconds!
•	Discover incredible bargains in your area!
•	No listing or transaction fees!
•	Meet nearby to exchange your item for cash!
•	Share with friends & local community with Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, etc

VINTAGE MARKETPLACE
Vintage marketplace is an online garage sale (yard sale) application for beautiful used items. You can buy, sell or make deals on used clothes, secondhand bags, shoes, clothing, fashion items, shirts, apparel, accessories, handmade, art and craft, collectibles, baby gear, games, cars, home goods, antiques, used furniture, services, bikes, scooters, books, mobile phones, electronics, consoles, retro games, toys and much more!

SHARING

CONTACT US

developer: DSM Grup Danismanlik Iletisim ve Satis Tic. A.S.
description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

developer: UBUY COMPANY FOR DESIGNING AND MANGING WEBSITES
description:
UBUY: YOUR GATEWAY TO GLOBAL LUXURY AND PREMIUM BRANDS

Seeking brands and products that are unavailable in your region? Don't worry; Ubuy is the perfect solution. Experience seamless access to a vast array of products from international brands. Explore and purchase premium products from around the world, with hassle-free delivery right to your doorstep in over 180 countries. Ubuy offers an extensive selection of luxury and premium products, ensuring you get what you desire.

WHAT SETS UBUY'S ONLINE LUXURY SHOPPING APP APART?
Ubuy provides many options for those seeking to buy branded and premium products unavailable in the local market. The following are reasons why you should try shopping with Ubuy:

*Delivery in 180+ countries
*Over 100 million premium products
*7+ warehouses worldwide
*Free shipping on fashion store

WHAT MAKES UBUY THE BEST APP FOR INTERNATIONAL ONLINE SHOPPING?
The Ubuy application boasts a user-friendly interface and an expansive assortment of high-end products for every need and requirement. Following are some of its best features:

*Easy order tracking
*Notification for latest updates
*24*7 customer support
*Secure Online Transactions
*Customer support in multiple languages
*Easy return and refund policy
*Shop with Ucredits to save more

Discover a wide range of branded products, including electronics, fashion, automotive goods, and beauty essentials, all available under one roof:

Electronic Items: Enhance your comfort and convenience with top-quality electrical appliances for your kitchen, bathroom, and every corner of your home.

Fashion & Jewellery: Choose our amazing collection and be the center of attraction wherever you go.

Health & Household: Prioritise your health with premium health and household products.

Cell Phones & Accessories (Mobiles): Get everything you want at your fingertips with cell phones, accessories, smartphones, etc., from the top brands around the globe.

Automotive: Maintain your car's excellence with top-quality automotive products.

Office Products: Streamline your office tasks using our luxury office items, including printers, printer ink, fax machines, and document cameras.

Sports and Tools: Embrace a healthier lifestyle by equipping yourself with essential fitness tools. From skipping ropes to dumbbells and gym vests, keep pace with the fast-paced world.

Beauty & Personal Care: Elevate your beauty routine with our skincare and haircare essentials.

Home & Kitchen: Elevate your home and kitchen aesthetics by incorporating our premium kitchenware products.

Luggage & Travel Gear: Explore the globe with top-tier luggage and travel gear at unbeatable prices.

UBUY ONLINE ABROAD SHOPPING STORES

Elevate your shopping experience with Ubuy's elite network of globally acclaimed shipping partners. Count on us for swift and reliable delivery because we have well-structured logistics to ensure that your product reaches your doorstep on time, every time.

Browse through a diverse array of international products from our multiple stores available worldwide:

USA: Explore exclusive premium brands from the USA.

UK: Indulge in luxury with products from renowned UK brands.

Kuwait: Experience the essence of Kuwait with a variety of high-quality items.

China: Explore a selection of genuine Chinese brands at our store.

Japan: Elevate your tech game with cutting-edge products from Japan.

Korea: Delve into the world of Korean beauty with the best products, from face washes to sheet masks and beyond.

Hong Kong: Check out exclusive Hong Kong branded products not accessible locally to shop.

India: Find Indian Products, from traditional dresses to authentic spices from true Indian brands at Ubuy. 

Turkey: Order top-quality Turkish products today, such as tea, lamps, towels, etc., from native Turkish brands at Ubuy.

Germany: Shop from Germany for premium German brands and items, exclusively on Ubuy, with swift delivery to your doorstep.

The ASOS app is home to more than 850 brands, over 85,000 products, free delivery and return options. We empower fashion-loving 20-somethings all over the world to be whoever they want to be.

More ASOS app perks:

• Apple Pay for easy, speedy checkout
• Style Match – just take a picture, or upload one, and we’ll find similar products for you
• My Recommendations, AKA a tailor-made edit personalised for you
• A seamless experience between devices (synced Saved Items and shopping bag)
• Sale alerts and promotional nudges, so you’ll always stay up to date
• Handy catwalk videos and 360-degree views of products
• Delivery to 242 countries worldwide

developer: Beijing Jingdong Century Trading Co., Ltd.
description:
【京东】—— 又好又便宜
京东APP是国内领先的综合电商平台，整合全品类购物、外卖点餐及生活服务于一体，致力于为消费者提供“又好又便宜”的一站式消费体验。

【平台优势】

汇聚超1000万个自营商品及百万优质商家，覆盖电脑数码、手机通讯、超市好物、家电家居、服饰美妆、消费品、汽车、生活服务等全品类，满足消费者吃喝玩乐全方位需求。

● 百亿补贴：大牌限时补贴，全场包邮。
● 京喜自营： 超值低价好货，工厂直发，京东快递包邮直达消费者。
● 京东秒杀：正品限时秒，折扣享不停。
3.  售后无忧，服务护航
● 极速配送：省心省时，送货上门，提供211限时达、次日达、极速达、夜间配等多种高效配送服务，闪电到货。京东秒送，好物立享，最快9分钟送到手。
● 售后无忧：闪电退款，价格保护，降价退差，上门换新。客服响应迅速，实在服务，时刻守护

【平台特色】
1. 品质外卖，上京东
京东外卖于2025年3月1日正式上线，致力于成为让消费者放心、让优质商家经营更好、让骑手更有保障的负责任的品质外卖平台。
2、订酒店，上京东
京东酒店，又好又便宜。首住特惠最高立减130元。
3. 重磅新品，抢先体验
京东新品，频道每日上新，汇聚更新更潮的大牌尖货，更有天天1元抽重磅新品。
4. PLUS会员，省心又省钱
京东PLUS，权益重磅升级，7大生活服务随心兑。
5. 看直播，享福利
京东直播，领取专享折扣，专享红包抢不停。

【更多服务，联系我们】
喜欢又好又便宜的京东，请给我们满分好评；
如有建议请及时反馈，我们一起优化更好的购物流程和体验；
可通过以下方式联系我们：
京东客服热线：950618

Discover trendy outfits, dresses, jeans and affordable clothing with fast shipping and 1000+ new arrivals weekly. Our online shopping app brings stylish women's, curve, men's and kids’ fashion to your fingertips as the #1 most-searched fashion brand.

-----
WHY FASHION NOVA IS YOUR STYLE ESSENTIAL
-----

• 1000+ NEW ARRIVALS WEEKLY: Be the first to rock the latest trends and new clothes before anyone else. Our design team brings you trendy outfits inspired by runway looks.
• INCLUSIVE SIZING: Perfect fits for every body type with our Women's, Plus Size, Curve, Men's, and Kids collections. Our trendy clothing is designed to flatter all bodies.
• CELEBRITY-APPROVED STYLES: Worn and loved by today's biggest stars. Our trendy outfits have been featured in music videos, red carpet events, and social media posts.
• UNBEATABLE PRICES: Runway-inspired fashion at discount prices that won't break the bank. We deliver boutique-quality clothing at affordable prices.
• LIGHTNING-FAST SHIPPING: Get your must-have pieces delivered quickly to your door. Shop new clothes and have them arrive in time for the weekend.

Download the Fashion Nova app now and experience why we're the fastest-growing online boutique worldwide. Shop our trendy clothing collection today—your next head-turning outfit is just a tap away!

Description. 

Get the latest trends and discover them from any location. If you love wearing fashion and using any occasion to buy clothes via the internet, download our MANGO app. Simple, easy and intuitive! 

Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Be inspired by all the proposals for the perfect shopping experience.  

Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device. 

Whenever you log on to our online clothing app with your user ID and password, your items will be saved so that you can access them from any device. So, if you start filling your shopping bag from your Smartphone and later decide to continue shopping via your Tablet, the items will be synchronised, allowing you to finalise your order whenever and however you want. Enjoy your online fashion app whenever you want! 

Barcode scanner. 

You can also use the app when you are shopping in our physical stores. If you see an item you want to buy but there are none left in your size or preferred colour, you can get it via our app. Scan the barcode of the item, or enter it manually, to see where you can find one or to buy it online. Once you have placed the order, you can receive it at home or at your preferred location. 

Exclusive information

You can also use our app to stay up to date with our promotions and exclusive offers in online fashion. Enable the instant notifications feature and you’ll be among the first to discover the new collection garments arriving each week, the lookbooks to inspire your stylings of the season and the discounts and promotions you can enjoy. 

Find your nearest store. 

If you need to have the garment you want right now, use the geolocation feature of our app and find your nearest store and the quickest way to get there. 

Create your Wishlist. 

Now, your Wishlist, in a single click: include all the garments you like most in your Wishlist. Also, if you didn't manage to buy a garment in time, you can enable an availability notification. Simply enter your e-mail and you’ll receive a message as soon as it’s back in stock. 

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also log on to the My orders section to keep all your till receipts, for both online orders and your purchases in physical stores.  You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way. 

We invite you to send us your comments and suggestions on this update at the following e-mail address: online@mango.com

Яндекс Маркет — это маркетплейс с 50 миллионами товаров и быстрой доставкой.

Техника и электроника, одежда и обувь, мебель и товары для дома, всё для ремонта и всё для уюта, косметика, игрушки, товары для спорта, для животных, для творчества. Популярные, брендовые, оригинальные. Всё это ищите на Яндекс Маркете, и оно здесь найдётся. 

ОРИГИНАЛЬНЫЕ ТОВАРЫ
Качественные и подлинные. Всё потому, что мы тщательно проверяем продавцов, а они дорожат своим рейтингом.

НИЖЕ РЫНКА И ЛЮБИМЫЕ КАТЕГОРИИ
Маркет сам подсказывает, как покупать выгоднее. Значок «ниже рынка» подсвечивает товары с самыми низкими ценами, чтобы вам не пришлось сравнивать стоимость в разных интернет-магазинах. А любимые категории дают скидки до 70% — вам нужно только выбрать свои.

ОЧЕНЬ УМНАЯ ЛЕНТА РЕКОМЕНДАЦИЙ
Она чувствует и предугадывает, какой из товаров вам понравится. И может даже вдохновить вас на что-нибудь: сделать подарок без повода или завести новое хобби.

НАСТОЯЩИЕ ОТЗЫВЫ ОТ НАСТОЯЩИХ ЛЮДЕЙ
Покупатели Маркета — лучшие советчики. Они честно рассказывают, что понравилось, а что не очень. Так вы сможете узнать всё про товар ещё до его покупки.

ДОСТАВКА ПО КЛИКУ
Работает очень просто. Выберите день доставки, а когда будете готовы принять заказ, кликните в приложении. 15–30 минут — и курьер у вас.

КУРЬЕРСКАЯ ДОСТАВКА
Удобная и быстрая. Быстрая и удобная. Курьер приедет как раз тогда, когда вы его ждали. Или ещё раньше, если закажете экспресс.

ПРОСТОЙ ВОЗВРАТ
Если товар не подошёл или вы просто передумали, оформляете возврат онлайн и получаете деньги назад. Вот и все дела.

ОТЗЫВЧИВАЯ КОМАНДА ПОДДЕРЖКИ
Задавайте вопросы в чате — в Маркете поддержка с настоящими людьми. Быстрая, внимательная и всегда поможет разобраться.

УЮТНЫЕ ПВЗ
С просторными примерочными и приветливыми сотрудниками. Заглядывайте.

Теперь вы всё-всё знаете про Яндекс Маркет, он же маркетплейс, интернет-магазин или, как ещё говорят, онлайн-магазин. Вы даже знаете, что на Маркете есть техника и электроника, одежда и обувь, мебель и товары для дома, косметика и духи. Да и чего только нет. И всё это в простом и удобном приложении, которое как раз можно скачать здесь.

FidMarques s’engage avec les Grandes Marques du quotidien et récompense votre fidélité !
Rejoignez le club et inscrivez-vous aux cartes de fidélité de vos produits préférés, proposées régulièrement.
Cumulez des points avec vos achats et obtenez des produits remboursés !


Des cartes de fidélité pour vos produits préférés.
***********************************
Vous avez déjà des cartes de fidélité Carreprix ou Monofour? Découvrez avec FidMarques les cartes de fidélité des grandes marques que vous consommez au quotidien.
En tant que nouveau membre de la communauté FidMarques, inscrivez-vous aux cartes qui vous plaisent et profitez de leurs avantages. D’autres marques vous seront proposées régulièrement.


Comment ça marche pour profiter des avantages de vos cartes de fidélité ?
************************
Prenez en photo votre ticket de caisse en rentrant de vos courses. L’application reconnaîtra alors les produits que vous avez achetés et vous ajoutera des points sur vos cartes concernées (1€ d’achat = 2 points).
Dès que vous avez assez de points, choisissez un produit remboursé dans le catalogue cadeaux de chaque marque.
C’est aussi simple que ça !


On m’offre vraiment des cadeaux ?
************************
Oui. On ne parle pas d’obtenir 30 centimes de réduction sur une marque.
Ni d’avoir un produit remboursé qui ne vous intéresse pas et que vous ne reprendrez plus jamais.
On vous parle d’être récompensé.e.s en tant que clients fidèles, sur la durée, et d’être remboursé.e.s sur des produits qui vous plaisent vraiment.
